name: android-adb-commands-helper-for-developers-extension
title: Adb Commands
description: 执行各种 Android Debug Bridge (ADB) 相关命令，辅助开发工作
author: linshaoyou

commands.name: killsj
commands.title: Killsj
commands.subtitle: 杀掉悟空浏览器进程，并重启
commands.description: 杀掉悟空浏览器进程，并重启

commands.name: cleansj
commands.title: Cleansj
commands.subtitle: 清除悟空浏览器缓存，并重启
commands.description: 清除悟空浏览器缓存，并重启
